      This method is used to perform the fortification stage in the game.

      This method returns the number of armies that the player will get in the reinforcement phase of the game.

      This method is used to assign armies during Game initialization
      boolean Player.reinforceArmies(Player player, Country country, int armies)
      This method is used to make changes in the number of armies in a country when the player is in the reinforcement stage.
      void Country.setOwner(Player owner)
      This method sets the name of the player as the owner of the country.
      void Continent.setOwner(Player owner)
      This method sets the value for owner as the name of the player that has conquered all of the countries in that continent.
